comments.creator: jimb@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 578503
Test that Debugger.prototype.onEnterFrame handlers fire when eval handles something as JSON.

In SpiderMonkey, 'eval' tries to foist the expression off on the JSON
parser if it looks like it could work, since the JSON parser is faster. But
that path doesn't tickle the debugger's monitoring points.
comments.author: jimb@mozilla.com
